response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth to you, we're offering it at $11,000. This price reflects the product's high value and ensures a fair transaction for both parties. We trust this offer will meet your expectations and make it a win-win situation for us all.", "product_price": 11000}
